name: fatiguingly
content:
Add to word list

in a way that makes you feel tired: The farmer had laboured fatiguingly in the fields all day and fell asleep at the table. It was a fatiguingly hot day that drained you of all energy.
More examplesFewer examplesThe speaker had a fatiguingly monotonous voice and I could hardly keep my eyes open.Our feet sank fatiguingly into the wet sand at every step.I found her exuberant performance to be too fatiguingly energetic for me to enjoy it.
